item.description:
Meet other local Hand-Drummers, djembe players and dunun drummers who are interested in creating community in a drum circle. Learn and share fun rhythms with other drummers for use in other drum circles. Whatever happens, it will be a fun drumming experience that you won't soon forget!

Please bring a drum and a chair. A jacket and water are also good ideas. If you don't have a drum, don't worry, we will bring extras. If anyone can bring an extra chair, it could help us all.

If it rains, we will meet the following Friday.

See you in circle!

Alan
item.how_to_find_us: We will welcome you into the circle.
item.name: Drum Circle ON THE CHARLES! A night to remember...
